entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
